const response = await client.search({
  query: {
    bool: {
      must: {
        match_all: {},
      },
      filter: {
        geo_polygon: {
          "person.location": {
            points: [
              [-70, 40],
              [-80, 30],
              [-90, 20],
            ],
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
